mapper.insert: insert into non_medicine (non_medicine_id, non_medicine_type, non_medicine_name, non_medicine_unit_price, non_medicine_specification) values(#{non_medicine_id}, #{non_medicine_type}, #{non_medicine_name}, #{non_medicine_unit_price}, #{non_medicine_specification})
mapper.select: select * from non_medicine where non_medicine_id LIKE concat(concat('%',#{non_medicine_id}),'%')
